crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Common Stealer Behavior - Source IP Associated with Hosting Provider Check via ip.api .com
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Common Stealer Behavior - Source IP Associated with Hosting Provider Check via ip.api .com"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:21; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:"|2f|line|2f 3f|fields|3d|hosting"; fast_pattern; http.header_names; bsize:22; content:"|0d 0a|host|0d 0a|connection|0d 0a 0d 0a|"; nocase; http.host; bsize:10; content:"ip-api.com"; http.connection; bsize:10; content:"Keep-Alive"; threshold:type limit,count 1,seconds 300,track by_src; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2062720; rev:4; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2025_06_03, deployment Perimeter, former_category HUNTING, confidence Medium, signature_severity Critical, updated_at 2025_06_09; target:src_ip;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY External IP Lookup ip-api.com"; flow:established,to_server; http.host; content:"ip-api.com"; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2022082; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_11_13, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_11_26, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (ip-api .com)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (ip-api .com)"; dns.query; bsize:10; content:"ip-api.com"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/chubin/awesome-console-services; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2054141; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_06_28, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2024_06_28, reviewed_at 2024_10_04, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction"; flow:established; app-layer-event:applayer_detect_protocol_only_one_direction; flowint:applayer.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2260002; rev:1;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious use of an .exe extension after a non-executable file extension like .pdf.exe, a set of spaces or underlines to cloak the executable file in spear phishing campaigns
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @blu3_team (idea), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Script Execution From Temp Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious script executions from temporary folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Credential Manager Access By Uncommon Applications
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects suspicious processes based on name and location that access the windows credential manager and vault.
Which can be a sign of credential stealing. Example case would be usage of mimikatz "dpapi::cred" function

Adversaries may steal data by exfiltrating it over an un-encrypted network protocol other than that of the existing command and control channel.
The data may also be sent to an alternate network location from the main command and control server.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.
Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets
Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Access To Windows DPAPI Master Keys By Uncommon Applications
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects file access requests to the the Windows Data Protection API Master keys by an uncommon application.
This can be a sign of credential stealing. Example case would be usage of mimikatz "dpapi::masterkey" function
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

signature_info.comments: Blue Screen Analyzer - Windows Crash Dump Analysis Tool

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows
